changes.context: Added to error logging in validation failure

patterns_discovered: Consistent environment variable validation pattern using Zod
Comprehensive error logging for missing environment variables
Optional environment variables are handled with .optional() method
Environment variable filtering for debugging/logging purposes

approach_outcome.efficiency: High - used existing patterns without over-engineering
